THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail directly references the subject of sexual reproduction in animals by showing two giraffes in a suggestive posture with the bold text 'ANIMAL SEX', matching the provocative/educational tone of the video title ('Sexual & Asexual Reproduction: How Animals Do It'). The use of cartoon imagery and hearts keeps the tone light and suitable for an educational audience.
